name: The Mountain Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hikes through the valleys and gorges of Kyrgyzstan
description: Join a group of eager hikers and spend a week wading through the wild untouched nature in the valleys of Kyrgyzstan. Staring at Jety Ogyz, this hike is advised for people of intermediate and above fitness level.

name: The Kayaker
summary: Exploring the natural mountain lakes and rivers by kayaking
description: A fitness intensive journey through the wild rivers and mountain lakes of kyrgyzstan. We will start in a high mountanous region, then drive to the famed pearl of central asia - Issyk Kul. From there we will kayak our way to the other side of the shore and hike at the southern shoreline towards more extreme mountain rivers. Some prior kayaking experience is encouraged.

name: The Snow Enthusiast
summary: Exciting adventure skiing/snowboarding in the wild peaks of Central Asia
description: Have you ever been at the top of the world? Well with this skiing tour you will get the chance to experience a sensation only a few have experienced in the world. The skiing experience is taylored for all levels, with the hardest black diamond slopes being at over 4000m elevation height. The cabins at which you will stay are state of the art with triple glazed pane windows and a fireplace to have the view and be cozy after a long day of skiing.

name: The Local Nomad
summary: Living the life of freedom in the countryside in the ways of a traditional Nomad
description: This trip will have you living in ways of a traditional nomad, moving from place to place in the mountains and valleys whilst spending the night in a yurt. You will learn how to ride a horse, practice archery and swordsmanship, playa game on horsebakc which is akin to rugby on horseback. You will also get to interact with the locals and learn all the customs and culture all in incredbile surroundings. This is perfect for people who want a comfortable getaway with a rustic touch. The yurts are modernised and prebuilt. There is an option to stay in a real yurt where you can heat it at night by using a fireplace and chopping wood in the wild

name: The Horse Rider
summary: Roam through the wilderness of untouched nature in the mountains of Central Asia. Be taken aback by the stunning beauty of the little explored region whilst exploring the surroundings like a true steppe nomad.
description: Prior experience of horse riding is encouraged, but by no means a deal breaker. If you need extra guidance there will be local guides to teach you.

name: The City Lover
summary: A city escape exploring the post Soviet/nomadic architecture and traditions. Join in the fun with Parajumping, rockclimbing and exploring the nightlife in the mix.
description: Get to see the city and local restaurants and Kyrgyzstani hopitality in all its glory. You will be staying in a hotel in teh city, with day trips to the mountains and different activities every day. The pricetag takes care of everything including meeting you at the airport, hotel, food and drinks (breakfast, lunch, dinner). This tour culminates with a trip to Issyk Kul lake, where you will get to watch the World Nomad Games.

name: The Tourist
summary: Spend the entire time resting at the famed Issyk Kul lake with all of its amenities.
description: This tour is more of a getaway and has you resting at the world's third largest natural mountain lake. You will be staying at a hotel that provides everything you need including food. There are all sorts of local amenities - retaurants, nightclubs, daily excursions etc... A perfect getaway to have Ibiza and Switzerland at your doorstep.

name: The Climber
summary: Climb the peaks of Kyrgyzstan which are over 7500m in height.
description: This is a tour for hardened mountain climbers. We will have designated sherpas and guides to help you in your journey
